name: interspireSubmit
overview:
interspireSubmit is a market leading internet marketing company for small/medium sized businesses. interspireSubmit aim is to deliver quality services to businesses who are looking for an affordable alternative to search marketing

Our main goal is to provide the best possible customer care to all of our clients. This is essential to maintain long lasting business relationships with our customers. We offer a wide range of support methods such as phone, email & live chat. We always return all support & sales requests the same day bearing in mind it is between 8am - 11pm GMT.

We are obsessed with quality code & link building, the following points bellow represent our commitment to providing the highest quality service:

  • White hat, Ethical & Organic link building process, we do not use automated tools to post the links, we do all the work by hand.
  • Keyword research, we find the best keywords for your site with the highest quality of traffic.
  • Cross browser compatibility, Improved caching, Image compression, Accessibility enhancement and much more
  • W3C Valid HTML5 & CSS3
  • Logical and intuitive CSS class / selectors naming conventions.
